title: JAM ORB / fuckoffafterthought
description: Afterthought dialogue if you told the lorry driver to fuck off.

dialogueTree.title: Half Light: "Damn, that felt *good*. Your heart'..."
dialogueTree.text: Damn, that felt *good*. Your heart's pounding nicely. You should tell people to fuck off more often.

links.title: Volition: "No, you shouldn't. You're an office..."
links.text: No, you shouldn't. You're an officer of the law.

links.title: You: ""Kim, I think I should tell people..."
links.text: "Kim, I think I should tell people to fuck off more often. It felt really good."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not as a general rule, but that on..."
links.text: "Not as a general rule, but that one was justified. Better to get the lay of the land before telling people to fuck off."

links.title: Authority: "That means you should do it wheneve..."
links.text: That means you should do it whenever you feel like someone's disrespecting your authority.

links.title: Half Light: "Never forget: The whole world's a w..."
links.text: Never forget: The whole world's a wooden house and you're a god damn flamethrower.

links.title: Half Light: "Hey, I've got an idea on how to fix..."
links.text: Hey, I've got an idea on how to fix your style. Maybe you should just go fuck yourself? Yeah, ever thought of that?
